Pre-reqs: (Fourth-year standing in SOWK.)
This section of the course is ONLINE- distance education. Your instructor and course support staff will contact you by email prior to and during the course. Please ensure you have a valid email account through Interchange/Netinfo. You will need your Campus Wide Login (CWL) to login to your course at https://www.elearning.ubc.ca/ . Course materials must be ordered or picked up at the UBC Bookstore. For more information, check the Learner's Guide for distance education at : http://ctlt.ubc.ca/
It is important to be sure that your distance course is eligible under the student loan program. For your reference: http://www.students.ubc.ca/finance/loans.cfm?page=courseloads.
Where applicable, please visit this site for examination information: http://www.students.ubc.ca/coursesreg/exams/
courseName: Social Work Practice in Community Mental Health
description: Online course providing overview of social work services to persons with a mental illness.
